title: That Canada Day
description: Dive right into this choose your own alien invasion adventure ride, where you are Stu, a friend of a friend who's house you go to for a night of poker. Just as the night gets on its way, the sky darkens and screams fill the air. The others don't panic, but you must choose who to follow as these seemingly regular guys go to the extreme and try to stop this invasion and save mankind. But can they pull it off, did you choose the right path, only you can decide your fates...
author: Steve Antonette
